title: Functional Equations: Advanced Techniques
content:
Overview

Use substitution frameworks (e.g., set x=y, y=0), injectivity/symmetry, bounding, and search for polynomial forms.

Hard Problem

Find all functions f:\mathbb{R}\to\mathbb{R} such that f(x+f(y))=f(x)+y for all reals x,y.

Solution Sketch

Put x=0 to see surjectivity; deduce injectivity; conclude f(x)=x+c then pin down c=0.

# Verify candidate f(x)=x works
import random
for _ in range(10):
    x,y=[random.uniform(-5,5) for __ in range(2)]
    f=lambda t:t
    assert abs((f(x+f(y)))-(f(x)+y))<1e-9
print("works")
